<% f.fields_for :images do |image_fields| %> <% if image_fields.object.new_record? %>
<%= image_fields.file_field :image %>

<%= link_to_add_fields "add", f %>

<% end %> <% end %> <% f.fields_for :images do |image_fields| %> <% unless image_fields.object.new_record? %>
<%= link_to image_tag(image_fields.object.image.url(:low)), image_fields.object.image.url(:high) %> <%= link_to_remove_fields "remove", image_fields %>
<% end %> <% end %>
<%= link_to image_tag(image_fields.object.image.url(:low)), image_fields.object.image.url(:high) %> <%= link_to_remove_fields "remove", image_fields %>

def link_to_add_fields(name, f)
    new_object = f.object.class.new
    fields = f.fields_for(new_object, :child_index => "new_#") do |builder|
      render("image_fields", :f => builder)
    end
    link_to_function(name, h("add_fields(this, '#', '#{escape_javascript(fields)}')"))
  end
